
$ 000000
# MOV
000011111000111111110000010100

$ 000001
# ADD
000111110110111110000000010100

$ 000010
# ADC
000111110110111110000000110100

$ 000011
# SUB
001011110110111110000010010100

$ 000100
# SBC
001011110110111110000000110100

$ 000101
# AND
010011110110111110000000010100

$ 000110
# OR
010111110110111110000000010100

$ 000111
# XOR
011011110110111110000000010100

$ 001000
# BIC
011110001000111111110000000000
010011110110111110000000010100

$ 001010
# CMP
001011110110111110000010000100

$ 001011
# INC
000011110110111111110010010100

$ 001100
# DEC
001111110110111111110000010100

$ 001101
# CLR
111111111111111111110000010100

$ 001110
# INV
011111110110111111110000010100

$ 001111
# LSR
100011110110111111110000010100

$ 010000
# ROR
100111110110111111110000010100

$ 010001
# RRC
101011110110111111110000110100

$ 010010
# ASR
101111110110111111110000010100

$ 010011
# LSL
110011110110111111110000010100

$ 010100
# ROL
110111110110111111110000010100

$ 010101
# RLC
111011110110111111110000110100

$ 010110
# HLT
111111111111111111110000001100

$ 010111
# NOP
111111111111111111110000000100

$ 011000
# RESET
111111111111111111111000000100

$ 011001
# JSR
000000100010010100100011000000
001101010011100001100000000000
001100110011011000100101000000
111111111111001010000000000100

$ 011101
# RTS
111111111111010100110001000000
000000110011001001100010000100

$ 011111
# fetch source register mode
111111111111100000010000000010

$ 100000
# fetch source auto-increment mode
000000010001010100010011000000
000011111111100001100000000010

$ 100010
# fetch source auto-decrement mode
001101010001111111110001000000
001100010001100001100000000010

$ 100100
# fetch source offset mode
000000100010010100100011000000
000101010001111101100001000000
111111111111100001100000000010

$ 100111
# fetch destination register mode
111111111111011000000000000011

$ 101000
# fetch destination auto-increment mode
000000000000010100000011000011

$ 101001
# fetch destination auto-decrement mode
001101010000111111110001000000
001100000000111111110000000011

$ 101011
# fetch destination offset mode
000000100010010100100011000000
000101010001111101100001000011

$ 101101
# fetch and decode instruction
000000100010010100100011000000
111111111111010001100000000001

$ 101111
# branching
000000100010010100100011000000
010010000111111101100000000000
000100101000111100100000000100
